MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Penycae and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:10PM 14th April 2021
